page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: There are different types of housing in this area, ranging from luxurious detached properties in the Â£90,000 range to town houses on council estates. Descriptions of the properties produce the following evidence :- (1){Semi-Detached}Bungalow in Highfield Rd. Est. Value:Â£32,000 Rooms: 8 Inc. 3 Bathrooms,Kitchen Lge. Front & Back Gardens & garage. (2){Detached}House in Hinderton Brown Est. Val:Â£90,000 Rooms: 8 + Garage. Half-acre of land. (3){Town House}in Riverside Walk. Est. Val.:Â£21,500 7 years old. Rooms include 3 bedrooms, living room & and bathroom. (4)Council Terrace House in Romney Close.Rooms: 4 bdrms., living rm., kitchen & bathroom. No garage.
